trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_SEQ_00<tab>Though Rasho is a man of few words, he has some left to say.
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_TODO_00<tab>Search for Lyse.
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_TODO_01<tab>Join Alisaie on the Isle of Bekko.
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_TODO_02<tab>Search for the Blue Kojin village.
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Alisaie.
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_ALISAIE_000_000<tab>Thank you for placing your faith in me. All that remains is to carry out our promise...ambitious as it is.
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_TANSUI_000_005<tab>Bold claims and even bolder promises. I should be interested to see if you can live up to them.
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_RASHO_000_010<tab>So. Alone you will deal with the Kojin.
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_RASHO_100_010<tab>If you are set upon this course, I shall give to you a word of advice.
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_RASHO_000_011<tab>Two factions have the Kojin. The mercenaries who serve the Empire belong to the Red.
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_RASHO_000_012<tab>Those who belong to the Blue are the traders. They have made no pact with the imperials, and so may be willing to aid your cause.
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_RASHO_000_013<tab>Seek the Blue on the Isle of Bekko. There you will find a cave. The rest is up to you.
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_ALISAIE_000_014<tab>Thank you, Captain. We shall endeavor not to keep you waiting overlong for your sign.
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_ALISAIE_000_015<tab>Right, then. Let us head for─ Wait, where is Lyse? We cannot leave without her.
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_RASHO_000_020<tab>We will be watching.
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_LYSE_000_030<tab>Hm? <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? What is it?
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_LYSE_000_031<tab>Oh, sorry. I didn't mean to wander off. I...I just wanted to have a think.
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_ALISAIE_000_032<tab>You're worried we won't be able to live up to our promises?
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_LYSE_000_033<tab>No, it's not that at all! If anything, I'm frustrated that I didn't think of it first...

TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_LYSE_000_034<tab>Yda and my father had a way with words. They knew how to inspire people─how to bring them together. I always hoped I might have something of that in me too, but I'm starting to think I don't.
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_LYSE_000_035<tab>What am I even doing here...?
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_ALISAIE_000_036<tab>...Lyse, you─
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_LYSE_000_037<tab>Gods, listen to me! I don't know where that came from. Forget I said anything!
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_LYSE_000_038<tab>We have places to go, imperials to fight, and friends to save! And we're not going to get any of it done by standing around here moaning, right?
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_LYSE_000_039<tab>...Right?
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_ALISAIE_000_040<tab>...Before we first traveled to Gyr Abania, I was in Limsa Lominsa, visiting...visiting a friend. A young child who had been through a great deal.

TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_ALISAIE_000_041<tab>...That's neither here nor there, I suppose. Anyway, on the way back, I passed a patisserie which sold some of the most exquisite-looking tarts I had ever seen. I've always preferred cookies, to be honest, but nevertheless I decided to stop and try one...
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_ALISAIE_000_042<tab>...I'll treat you to one, when all this is over. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> too─and I won't take no for an answer.
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_LYSE_000_043<tab>What about Y'shtola? We'd never hear the end of it!
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_ALISAIE_000_044<tab>All right, all right─Y'shtola too, once she's better. Deal? Good. Then let's hurry, shall we? We have a million things to do before then!
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_LYSE_000_050<tab>Red, Blue... Wait─didn't Soroban say something about this before?
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_ALISAIE_000_060<tab>I think this is the Isle of Bekko─though, to be honest, it looks the same to me as however many other islands around here...
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_ALISAIE_000_061<tab>Rasho said there was a cave that would lead us to their village. We should search further inland.
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_LYSE_000_070<tab>How much further do you think it is?
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_LYSE_000_080<tab>Of course! Soroban said he was a Kojin of the Blue, didn't he?
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_SOROBAN_000_085<tab>Pleased though I am to see you again, I am confused. Were you not bound for Othard?
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_ALISAIE_000_090<tab>How fortunate that we should find a familiar face in this place...
TEXT_STMBDA306_02482_ALISAIE_000_091<tab>We should tell Soroban about our situation. If anyone here can help us, it's him!
